lead_paragraph: Britain's recovery from its deepest recession in decades looks set to pass a milestone this week when a six-year run of declining living standards is expected to show a turnaround.

headline.main: UK Wages Poised to Pass Recovery Milestone
headline.print_headline: UK Wages Poised to Pass Recovery Milestone

snippet: Britain's recovery from its deepest recession in decades looks set to pass a milestone this week when a six-year run of declining living standards is expected to show a turnaround....
